WorkItem.Description:
1. Create a new HtmlDocument
2. Create an attribute using HtmlDocument.CreateAttribute(stirng)
3. Access HtmlAttribute.Value
 
NullReferenceException is thrown. I guess there is similar problem on more places - e.g. document.DocumentNode.OuterText getter.
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlAttribute.Value throws NullReferenceException when OwnerDocument.Text is null

Comments.Message: I guess fix to this particular issue is easy, add null check to the property getter.
